title: Saving Ludo - Novel Updates
tags: Amnesia   Antique Shop   Appearance Changes   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Brotherhood   Childhood Promise   Evil Gods   Ghosts   Magic   Transplanted Memories   Wishes
author: Ziggy Zezsyazeoviennazabrizkie
description:
Every time you say your prayers, God will always listen. But... do you know, it is not only God who listens to you.
Sometimes, there is something else listening to your prayers. Even in the middle of your desperate prayers, that 'something' will also listen to it.

What you can do is just wait. Whether God will answer to you first, or that 'something' will give you a shortcut, answering to your prayers before God does.

As you know, sometimes God's answer is postponed... and that 'something' can persuade you stronger than God's messenger.

If so, it means that you are in trouble...>
